page.title: 08YOUNG FAMILY IN WOOTTON
page.content: A young mother told us: the main reason for our living in Wootton is its convenient location between Newport and Ryde.The local facilities are good with a frequent Bus Service and a Mobile Library which visits once a week.A dentist is needed in our opinion.There are activities for our daughter and also for the old.We use the recreation ground and go to the local "Mothers and Toddlers" group.A typical day consists of housework, shopping, lunch, gardening and tea. This area is quiet and wellkept, the roads and beaches could be improved,but that's all.The Ferry Terminal is handy when we want to visit our relatives.When we moved here we were well looked after and the people were friendly.Our daughter will soon use the playgroup and then go to the local Primary School.
